title: Santa Stopped at the Wrong House
itunes:title: Santa Stopped at the Wrong House
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 40 year old married woman and my husband and I have two children, ages 6 and 8. He’s a fireman so he’s used to dressing as Santa for the neighborhood and the kids come by the fire station and get free pictures with Santa. He and two other guys do it annually............................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 40 year old married woman and my husband and I have two children, ages 6 and 8. He’s a fireman so he’s used to dressing as Santa for the neighborhood and the kids come by the fire station and get free pictures with Santa. He and two other guys do it annually............................
